A command-line file compressor that uses Huffman encoding

A game made at HackBU utilizing the Oculus Rift and Myo.

A compilation of image processing and video searching functions.
Minimal HashMap

A Hash map that uses a perfectly minimal hash function to allow for a Map data structure with O(1) access time.
Hungarian Algorithm

My implementation of the hungarian algorithm, which can solve assignment problems relatively quickly.
HimanZip

A command-line file compressor that uses lempel-ziv and huffman encoding .
